name: CI Agile
description: We are the first and only Agile training and consultancy company in South East Asia endorsed by Dr. Sutherland, the inventor of Scrum and the co-signatory of the Agile manifesto. We helped hundreds of organizations to successfully transform the way they work. We provide the resources and knowledge necessary to address your needs and drive better business outcome. With every client, we learn how Scrum fundamentally changes their way of working, and we use that knowledge to evolve Scrum and advance Agile practices around the globe. We believe in creating a productive and happy workplace through mentorship, training, and credentialing the next generation of Scrum Inc. trainers. Our global presence continues to grow so that we can be accessible to you whenever and wherever you are.

ShortDescription: CI Agile was founded to be a higher learning center for Dr Jeff Sutherland's original Scrum knowledge by uncovering better ways of practicing it and helping others to learn it.
enhanced_description: CI Agile is the leading Agile training and consultancy company in South East Asia, uniquely recognized as the first and only one endorsed by Dr. Sutherland, the inventor of Scrum and co-signatory of the Agile manifesto. As the Asia Pacific Regional Partner for Scrum Inc.'s Agile Education Program, CI Agile serves as a higher learning center dedicated to Dr. Jeff Sutherland's original Scrum knowledge. The company specializes in helping hundreds of organizations successfully transform their ways of working by implementing Scrum and Scrum@Scale. They provide essential resources and knowledge, focusing on mentorship, training, and credentialing the next generation of Scrum Inc. trainers, aiming to drive better business outcomes and foster productive, happy workplaces. With a growing global presence, CI Agile is accessible to clients worldwide, committed to evolving Scrum and advancing Agile practices.
